name: py-jupyter
description: Jupyter metapackage. Install all the Jupyter components in one go.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ipywidgets
dependencies.description: IPython widgets for the Jupyter Notebook

dependent_to.name: py-abipy
dependent_to.description: Python package to automate ABINIT calculations and analyze the results.

dependent_to.name: py-spatialist
dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.

dependent_to.name: py-mne
dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.

dependent_to.name: r-irkernel
dependent_to.description:
Native R Kernel for the 'Jupyter Notebook'. The R kernel for the
'Jupyter' environment executes R code which the front-end ('Jupyter
Notebook' or other front-ends) submits to the kernel via the network.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependent_to.name: py-openpmd-viewer
dependent_to.description: Python visualization tools for openPMD files
